page.title: 15More on Polsue Manor Farm
page.content: The cow shed was built in 1984.It was built of pine wood with steel gates inside to keep the cows in if necessary.The farmer does not use the cows for milking anymore. They grow crops as well.Silage is one of the crops that he grows,but the main crops are Spring barley and Winter barley.the farmer sells the barley on the open market for cash.He uses chemicals to help the crops grow stronger. The farmer owns a sheepdog to round up the sheep.He controls the dog by saying Come By and Away.Come by means to the left and away means to the right. The farmers wife also runs a Bed and Breakfast.
